body:
Comment 4 by **rafrombrc**: 
A helper note for anyone who might find this in a web search like I did: If you're using
goyacc and are having the "stack trace is spitting out bogus line numbers" problems, you
can work around the problem by re-running goyacc w/ the `-l=true` option, or removing by
hand all of the `//line` directives from your generated .go file. Once issue #4020 is
resolved you'll be able to put them back, but until then this will at least give you
reasonable stack traces again.
